EmailTemplate.name: Inclusion Confidentiality Agreement
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT: Confidentiality Agreement enclosed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on being provisionally offered one of our inclusion roles for Summer 2016!
'Matching' you to a young person
As our Inclusion roles generally work on a 1-2-1 basis with a young person, in order to be allocated to a work placement in the summer, we'll need to match you to a young person. We match young people to support staff based on the young person's needs and your background, experience and abilities.
In order to do this, we'll need to send you anonymous, sensitive information about your young person. As you are not contractually employed by The Challenge yet, we ask that you sign a confidentiality agreement ahead of us sending this information to you.
What do I need to do?
Please download the Confidentiality Agreement and print, read and return a signed copy to us no later than 3 June 2016.
https://staffing.the-challenge.org/assets/INCLUSION_DISCLOSURE_AGREEMENT_2016_(2).docx
Return your signed and scanned copy to inclusionroles@the-challenge.org. Your signed agreement will then be added to your profile, and we'll be able to start the matching process!
Any questions?
If you'd like any further information or clarification, please don't hesitate to get in touch using the contact details below - we'll be in touch in the coming weeks when the matching process is underway.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} {!Contact.OwnerPhone} inclusionroles@the-challenge.org
